content:
The provided chunk contains essential imports required for the MemoryExplorer tool, including DirectObject for event handling in Direct, Pmw for enhanced Tkinter widgets, and tkinter for GUI functionality. These imports are placed at the top of the document to ensure all necessary modules are available throughout the script, supporting the creation and operation of the memory analysis GUI.

```python
from direct.showbase.DirectObject import DirectObject
import Pmw
import tkinter as tk
```
